verses.verse: <S%G3004><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> A Parable <S%G3850><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> To The Purport That <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> To Pray Them <S%G4336><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> , To Faint, <S%G1573><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> A Judge <S%G2923><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> A City, <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Fearing <S%G5399><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Respecting. <S%G1788><s%>

<S%G5503><s%> And A Widow <S%G1161><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> That City, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Was Coming <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Avenge <S%G1556><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G476><s%> Mine Adverse Party. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Would Not <S%G2309><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> A Time; <S%G5550><s%> <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Afterwards <S%G5023><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> Within <S%G1722><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Fear Not <S%G5399><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Respect, <S%G1788><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> Yet Because <S%G1065><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Causes <S%G3930><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Trouble <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5503><s%> This Widow <S%G3778><s%> I Will Avenge <S%G1556><s%> <S%G846><s%> Her, <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Lest <S%G1519><s%> Perpetually <S%G5056><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> She Harass <S%G5299><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judge <S%G2923><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteous <S%G93><s%> Says. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Shall Execute <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Avenging <S%G1557><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1588><s%> Of His Elect <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Cry <S%G994><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night, <S%G3571><s%> And Is <S%G2532><s%> Being Patient <S%G3114><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Them? <S%G846><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Will Execute <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Avenging <S%G1557><s%> <S%G846><s%> Of Them <S%G1722><s%> Speedily. <S%G5034><s%> Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Indeed <S%G687><s%> Will He Find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth? <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Trusted <S%G3982><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Despised <S%G1848><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> This : <S%G3778><s%>

Men <S%G444><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> To Pray; <S%G4336><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> A Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> A Tax Gatherer. <S%G5057><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> Standing, <S%G2476><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Thus <S%G5023><s%> Was Praying, <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I Thank <S%G2168><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not <S%G1510><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> Rapacious, <S%G727><s%> Unrighteous, <S%G94><s%> Adulterers, <S%G3432><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherer. <S%G5057><s%>
I Fast <S%G3522><s%> Twice <S%G1364><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Week, <S%G4521><s%> I Tithe <S%G586><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> I Gain. <S%G2932><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherer <S%G5057><s%> Afar Off <S%G3113><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Would <S%G2309><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Lift Up, <S%G1869><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Was Striking <S%G5180><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4738><s%> His Breast, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Be Propitious <S%G2433><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sinner. <S%G268><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Went Down <S%G2597><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Justified <S%G1344><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Rather Than <S%G2228><s%> That. <S%G1565><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Exalts <S%G5312><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Humbled; <S%G5013><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He That <S%G1161><s%> Humbles <S%G5013><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

<S%G4374><s%> And They Brought <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Babes, <S%G1025><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Might Touch; <S%G680><s%> <S%G1492><s%> But Having Seen It <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Children <S%G3813><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Forbid <S%G2967><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Them; <S%G1063><s%> For Of Such <S%G5108><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Shall Receive <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Little Child <S%G3813><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ruler, <S%G758><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Having Done <S%G4160><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> <S%G2816><s%> <S%G2816><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Callest Thou <S%G3004><s%> Good? <S%G18><s%> No One Is <S%G3762><s%> <S%G18><s%> Good <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> <S%G1492><s%> Thou Knowest : <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3431><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Commit Adultery; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5407><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Commit Murder; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2813><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Steal; <S%G3361><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Bear False Witness; <S%G5576><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> Thy Mother. <S%G4675><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Have I Kept <S%G5442><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Youth <S%G3503><s%> My. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> One Thing <S%G1520><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Is Lacking; <S%G3007><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> As Much As <S%G3745><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> Sell, <S%G4453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Distribute <S%G1239><s%> To The Poor, <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Have <S%G2192><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> , Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come <S%G1204><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Very Sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> Became, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For He Was <S%G1063><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> Very. <S%G4970><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Seeing <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Very Sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> Having Become <S%G1096><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Difficultly <S%G1423><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G5536><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2123><s%> For Easier <S%G1063><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> A Camel <S%G2574><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> An Eye <S%G5168><s%> Of A Needle <S%G4476><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> A Rich Man <S%G4145><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Enter. <S%G1525><s%>
<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Heard, <S%G191><s%> Then <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Be Saved? <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Impossible <S%G102><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Has Left <S%G863><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Who <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Receive <S%G618><s%> Manifold More <S%G4179><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540><s%> This Time <S%G5129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>

<S%G3880><s%> And Having Taken To Him <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> We Go Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Accomplished <S%G5055><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Written <S%G1125><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> About The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man; <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3860><s%> For He Will Be Delivered Up <S%G1063><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Be Mocked <S%G1702><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Be Insulted <S%G5195><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Be Spit Upon. <S%G1716><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Scourged <S%G3146><s%> They Will Kill <S%G615><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> He Will Rise Again. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Of These Things <S%G5130><s%> Understood, <S%G4920><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> This Saying <S%G5124><s%> Hid <S%G2928><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Knew Not <S%G1097><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Said. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1448><s%> As He Drew Near <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> A Blind Man <S%G5185><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Sat <S%G2521><s%> Beside <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Begging. <S%G4319><s%>
Having Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Passing Along <S%G1279><s%> He Asked <S%G4441><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Might Be <S%G1498><s%> This. <S%G5124><s%>
<S%G518><s%> And They Told <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846><s%> Him, <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nazarene <S%G3480><s%> Is Passing By <S%G3928><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Called Out <S%G994><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> , Of David, <S%G1138><s%> Have Pity On <S%G1653><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Going Before <S%G4254><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Be Silent, <S%G4623><s%> <S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> , Of David, <S%G1138><s%> Have Pity On <S%G1653><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G2476><s%> And Having Stopped <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Commanded <S%G2753><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Be Brought <S%G71><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G1448><s%> And Having Drawn Near <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Desirest Thou <S%G2309><s%> I Shall Do? <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Receive Sight. <S%G308><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Receive Sight : <S%G308><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Thy Faith <S%G4675><s%> Hath Healed <S%G4982><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> He Received Sight, <S%G308><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Glorifying <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Having Seen It <S%G1492><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Praise <S%G136><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>
